author: mcculls
msg: Fix build break (unfortunately when bamboo does the multi-module build, Maven uses the released 1.2.1 bundleplugin instead of the 1.3.0-SNAPSHOT requested in this pom.xml - when I release the 1.4.0 bundleplugin this change can be reverted)
